com.percussion.publisher
Interface IPSPublisherSiteContext

All Superinterfaces:
com.percussion.publisher.IPSDTDSiteInfo
public interface IPSPublisherSiteContext
extends com.percussion.publisher.IPSDTDSiteInfo

This interface defines access methods for the publisher site information. Methods in the publisher plugin interface have access to this interface for publishing.

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from interface com.percussion.publisher.IPSDTDSiteInfo
ATTR_IPADDRESS, ATTR_PASSWORD, ATTR_PORT, ATTR_PUBLISHERID, ATTR_ROOTDIR, ATTR_SITEID, ATTR_SITENAME, ATTR_USERID, ELEM_ROOT
